title: İçimizdeki Ateş
overview: Mert, Bahar, Hale, and Ege, young lawyer candidates who graduated from the faculty of law, go through a tough elimination process and end up scoring internship positions with famous Lawyer Doğan Yener and his wife Tülin Tan. As a requirement, they must stay out of trouble during the internship. As life tests them with all kinds of obstacles on this journey, we will follow their adventures as they strive to reach their goals under the guidance of Doğan and Tülin...
